text: Bruce Hubbard (1952â€“1991) was an American operatic baritone singer. He is known for appearing in several productions of Show Boat and Porgy and Bess. Hubbard was born in Indianapolis, Indiana in 1951. == Other websites == * Category:1952 births Category:1991 deaths Category:African-American musicians Category:Singers from Indiana Category:Baritones
